manipulations.remove_object: Remove the baseball equipment, like the baseball glove, that the girl on the right side is carrying.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the purple baseball uniform of both children into a vibrant, eye-catching neon green material.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the park background with a photorealistic rendering of a bustling city street at night.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add a heavy rain effect with visible raindrops and reflections on the ground, suggesting a downpour.
manipulations.insert_object: Add a large, inflatable T-Rex dinosaur standing behind the child on the left, casting a shadow.
